name: Kristalina Georgieva
text: I had an exciting first day at the @IMFNews. A big thank you to all Fund staff and to followers for the good wishes. Together, we are going to continue to build a strong global institution that is ever more responsive to the needs of our membership.//t.co/1Fr0wbGrPA

name: Kristalina Georgieva
text: RT @IMFNews: The IMF Executive Board welcomes Kristalina @KGeorgieva as the new IMF Managing Director.//t.co/cETxOOuInL

name: Kristalina Georgieva
text: I am honored to walk through the doors as Managing Director of the IMF, an institution at the center of the international economic system. My goal is to further strengthen the Fund so that it can be ever more responsive to the evolving needs of our 189 member countries.//t.co/Dv50j4q9Ce

name: Kristalina Georgieva
text: I am honored to have met with President Tshisekedi and look forward to close cooperation and engagement with his new government at this important juncture in the country's history. I welcome his vision for a stronger #DRC, with better health and education services for its people.//t.co/2R0xC2eqKs

name: Kristalina Georgieva
text: As I leave @WorldBank today after 1,001 memorable days of service, I thank my fantastic friends and colleagues for the privilege of being part of a great team. Together, we have made the institution stronger, and focused on fighting poverty with passion and professionalism.//t.co/0uNEpAym8F

name: Kristalina Georgieva
text: I was delighted to meet again with Minister Luhut, one of Indonesia's outstanding leaders who helped make last year's annual meetings in Bali such a great success. Teri makasi.//t.co/dJZ9Z5278u

name: Kristalina Georgieva
text: It was a pleasure to meet Slovenian Minister of Finance Andrej Bertoncelj. We shared our views on recent economic developments in #Slovenia and ways to foster further reforms to raise growth and prosperity//t.co/hdUjfNFKvt

name: Kristalina Georgieva
text: I join the French people in mourning the loss of a great leader, Jacques Chirac. He was an eloquent advocate for multilateralism and the power of international cooperation. His voice will be missed, but his legacy will last forever.

name: Kristalina Georgieva
text: I look forward to working with the authorities as I take on my duties on October 1. Argentina is an important member of the #IMF and we want to see it succeed.//t.co/UZDHDrZxdx

name: Kristalina Georgieva
text: I am honored to have been selected as the Managing Director of @IMFNews. I look forward to joining the IMF's committed staff in serving our 189 member countries. Together, we will work to build stronger economies and improve people's lives everywhere.

name: Kristalina Georgieva
text: My thanks to #India's Minister of Finance Nirmala Sitharaman for the opportunity to present my candidacy for the position of Managing Director of the #IMF and for a very engaging discussion on future priorities.//t.co/ZcxqYthgtm

name: Kristalina Georgieva
text: My thanks to #India's Minister of Finance Nirmala Sitharaman for the opportunity to present my candidacy for the position of Managing Director of the #IMF and for a very engaging discussion on future priorities.//t.co/ZcxqYthgtm

name: Kristalina Georgieva
text: Sending my best wishes to the new College of European Commissioners presented by @vonderleyen today. As someone who was honored to serve as a Commissioner, I know you will feel humbled by the privilege and responsibility. Good luck!//t.co/vx0wkgI5wS

name: Kristalina Georgieva
text: It was a pleasure to meet finance ministers and central bank governors from Central America. An engaging discussion on regional developments and issues like inequality, climate change, gender and corruption. My thanks to @ArturoHerrera_G for hosting.//t.co/XaMauKv6wI

name: Kristalina Georgieva

name: Kristalina Georgieva
text: Sir David Attenborough: Populations are increasing but oceans are not. The way with are going we are losing our natural capital. @KGeorgieva: We @WorldBank make a pledge to protect that capital! JOIN NOW://t.co/ZS6t9gMZqr #BeatPlasticPollution #naturalcapital//t.co/RYWJtyJOVm

name: Kristalina Georgieva
text: Refuse, Reuse, Recycle, Rethink & RegulateThis should be our mantra to #BeatPlasticPollution and save the oceans for future generations. Thank you Sir David Attenborough for inspiring us and sharing your wisdom!//t.co/aWRr1LhmDs

name: Kristalina Georgieva

name: Kristalina Georgieva

name: Kristalina Georgieva
text: I remember where I was on 9/11 and what I did when a plane hit the first WTC tower in NY. I watched the second hit on live TV. Then left the building - another plane was feared to aim for the White House and I was 2 blocks away. Won't ever forget those who died. RIP.

name: Kristalina Georgieva
text: Today let us remember those we lost on September 11, 2001, and pledge to keep working together toward a more peaceful world for all.
